description:
betscores is fast, easy to use and complete! 

It's the ONLY app to deliver in one place, for FREE! 
- live scores
- live odds for 50+ bookies
- across 11 sports
- TV Guide

Available in-app purchases: banner ad removal

Compare the latest odds, find the best price in the market, follow the market trends, get live updates & notifications of your favorite teams and sports, anytime anywhere with betscores. 
The MOST complete, all-in-one application for all sports fans and betting enthusiasts alike. 

with betscores: 

• follow 11 sports: football, basketball, tennis, baseball, american football, ice hockey, rugby league, rugby union, cricket, volleyball and handball
• enjoy live scores for over 400 leagues and tournaments worldwide 
• check the latest betting offers and compare odds from 50+ major bookmakers
• get updates including notifications for all live match events: minute, cards, scorers, serving, quarter scores etc...
• check the match schedule of your favorite tv channels and setup an alert to never miss a match on tv 

Having more than half a million downloads and almost 5 stars overall rating, rest assured  betscores is the single  sports app for all your needs!


Betting information

- Real time odds from 50+ online bookmakers
- 3-way, Home/Away, Over/Under, Handicap
- Betting odds statistics: max and average.
- Sorting and trend indicator for the offered odds.


Coverage

• Football: more than 200 leagues 
• Tennis: all worldwide tournaments 
• Basketball: the most popular leagues 
• Ice hockey: the most popular leagues 
• Baseball: the most popular leagues 
• American Football: the most popular leagues
• Rugby Union, Rugby League: most popular leagues
• Cricket: most popular leagues
• Volleyball: most popular leagues
• Handball: most popular leagues



Highlights

- Easy, self explanatory what-you-see-is-what-you-get user interface
- Detailed event information:
 → Football: minute, scorer, cards.
 → Tennis: set, match, serving
 → Basketball: quarter, half time results
 → Ice Hockey: period, minute, scorer
 → Baseball: innings, hits, errors
 → American football: minute, player, quarter, FG, TD, EP, SAFE, ROUGE, PC2.
 → Rugby Union
 → Rugby League
- League tables available for all sports
- Facebook connect to post a match result or event on your wall
- Build your own list of favorite matches/leagues for easy access
- Real-time goal alerts for matches in the list of favorites
- Push notifications
- TV Guide for 200+ channels across Europe
- Advanced search functionality


TV Coverage

- 200+ channels across Europe: terrestrial, satellite and cable
- Available country packages: UK, Italy, France, Germany, Greece, Cyprus, Turkey and Sweden
- yearly subscription or once-off purchase at very low prices

Compatible with iPhone/IPod touch. Requires iPhone 5.1 OS or greater
releaseNotes: Fixed bug with push notifications on iOS 8
